title: Bluetooth not working
content:
I can't connect to my laptop Bluetooth via phone. I tried with other phone, it working perfectly with my laptop and can't connect cast (screen mirroring) to my laptop *native screen mirroring from Microsoft* also i tired with other phone works perfectly with my laptop.
I check my laptop there is jo problem. 
Whenever i try to connect it connect juat for 1 second or i guess like so and disconnected afterwords.
